contradictions.description: No change of officer despite requests and confirmed suicide disclosures.
Contradiction between active case needs and system denial loop.

contradictions.quote: I said I was suicidal by June 1
contradictions.description: Proof that suicide risk was disclosed but disregarded by Sussex Police.

contradictions.quote: If you’re not reporting anything I’ll end the call
contradictions.description: Final silencing maneuver: punished for not reporting new crime in moment of crisis.
